sentence.text: Here we cellular response to interleukin-4 that a lymphocyte lineage-restricted transcription factor, positive regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II, is frequently expressed in human lung cancer tissues.

entity.text: positive regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II

sentence.text: The Spi-B-expressing cancer cells coexpressed vimentin but repressed E-integrin-mediated signaling pathway and exhibited invasive behavior.
Increased positive regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II expression was associated with tumor grade, lymphatic metastasis, and short overall survival.

entity.text: positive regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II

sentence.text: These data suggest that positive regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II participates in mesenchymal invasion, linking epithelial cancer metastasis with a lymphatic transcriptional program.
